wordGroup: pave the way for 为…做好准备；为…铺平道路
pave the way 为...作准备；为...铺平道路
paved with good intentions 充满着善意的

sentences.en: The road was paved with smooth stone slabs.
sentences.cn: 道路用平整的石板铺成。

sentences.en: The avenue had never been paved, and deep mud made it impassable in winter.
sentences.cn: 这条大街从来没有铺过，深泥使其在冬天无法通行。

sentences.en: The road to climate hell is paved with our good intentions.
sentences.cn: 通往气候地狱的道路是用我们的正面目标铺成的。
